data.name: Kritagya_React_Portfolio
data.description: The complete portfolio website hosted using github pages (gh-pages). Visit the website here :

data.name: Movie-Recommendation-System
data.description: A content-based recommender system that recommends movies similar to the movie the user likes and analyses the sentiments of the reviews given by the user.The movies are recommended based on the content of the movie you entered or selected. The main parameters that are considered for the recommendations are the genre, director, and top 3 casts. The details of the movies, such as title, genre, runtime, rating, poster, casts, etc., are fetched from TMDB. The reviews of each individual movie given by the users are `web-scraped` from the IMDB website with the help of beautifulsoup4, and the reviews are subjected to sentiment analysis, where the model predicts whether the review is positive or negative.

data.name: Birla Real Estate Price Prediction
data.description: We have dataset of house prices with some features like no. of bathrooms, no. of bedrooms, etc. Our main task is to create a model which will predict the price of any house by looking at the features.

data.name: MERN E-Commerce website
data.description: This is a lengthy project created using MERN Stack with payment using Paypal gateway.A Full-Stack E-commerce application that uses React, Redux, MongoDB, Nodejs, ExpressJS and JWT Authentication with PayPal as well as Stripe payment system that allows sellers to upload and manage inventories and buyers to save goods to cart and purchase via Palpal.

data.name: Airbnb Clone Project React
data.description: This project was formed after learning the concepts of web development and React. It was built with the help of react containing a perfect blend of Logic and Designing when it comes to replicating some of the features of the original Airbnb. It has a home page from where you have to type in the country, Add the check-in and check-out dates from the calendar, and after mentioning the number of Adults and Children expected, you would get the list of rooms available with their pictures and names.

data.name: Netflix Clone
data.description: This application is another project created with the help of React and firebase and cypress for automation and testing. Similar to the original Netflix, the aim was to replicate those same functionalities through React.
